entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
